column4: Ive got some problems with my gaim. The log on button is grey, so I cant press it. Any ideas?
hold ALT and right-click with your mouse to drag window size.
(left click drag to move whole window)
I dont think thats the problem, the thing is, I cant log on because the button I'm sposed to press aint "pressable"?
possibly not letting you because of insufficent login information? Or a bug.
New install?
I've created an account, and i've typed the passy, still its gray. So bug then?
Tryed upgrading?
upgrading the gaim?
yep. Is it a new ubuntu install?
actually its Suse 10.2, but theres no people in the suse channel.
so I figured i'd try here, and then hope somebody knew anything 'bout it.
Then you still want to upgrade the system.
the whole thing?
Start with upgrading gaim if you can.
have to use yast then?
pft! i have no idea :)
that would be the same thing as synaptic in ubuntu. SOrt of.
yes it is.
eventually, there might be some other clients I could use?
Yes you can use other clients.
